plot: A veteran comes home haunted by his unit, and Melinda has trouble connecting with them.

Jim's buddy Matt Murphy and his girlfriend were looking forward to his final discharge from the National Guard after active duty tours in Iraq. But he has nightmares and becomes increasingly erratic, apparently plagued by a ghost. Melinda soon realizes it's not an Iraqi, but men from his unit who died in action. The question is how, and Matt can't remember.—KGF Vissers
